title: Cryptshrink
author: Cryptshrink
content: The Oasis Network has been working hard on the development of its Privacy Products, the Confidential EVM Sapphire Runtime, and the Oasis Privacy Layer or OPL. As shown in their most recent announcements like OPL's integration with Celer's Messaging Bridge. Now it seems Oasis is nearer than ever to fulfill its mission to give data sovereignty back to users and stablish a responsible data economy, were users and not corporations have control over their data, to not have te power to decide taken from them by anyone.Now, on the occasion of the ETHCC Oasis is having the Rendezvous event at Paris. Where the Oasis team, guests and attendants will have the chance to discuss in-depth the future of Web3 Privacy and learn how to build over Sapphire or to add privacy to your dapp on your native EVM chain. While also taking time to enjoy some crispy croissants and do some networking.So, if you are interested in supporting or at least knowing more on how Oasis is trying to give back to users the power over their data and enable smart privacy to EVM compatible Web3. It is a good opportunity to give them visit:https://oasisprotocol.org/oasis-rendezvous
